page.title: 19BUILDINGS
page.content:
There are various styles of houses in Bishops Castle.Many in the main street have not changed in over a hundred years.
Many of them are three storeys high together with a cellar.Years ago these were built so big because of the need for servants quarters.
One of the oldest buildings is called the "House on Stilts" which was built in the time of King Henry V111.It is made from timber and stands high above the street on wooden stilts.
Another prominent building in the town is the Porch House.This is a large building also with a timber frame and built at about the same time.
